QuestData.Title: Prepare for Trouble
QuestData.Description:
With the evidence you've gathered, we can prove that the Ashvane Company was behind the attack.
I would have preferred to do this in private, but I don't think we'll have the luxury. Look around - company men everywhere.
Priscilla's got something up her sleeve...
Let's get some backup before we go in there and cause a scene.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with $1oa Proudmoore Guards in Unity Square.
